name: AnchorStaking
description: AnchorStaking, visit us for non-costodial staking of ADA, KAVA & WanChain. Join our community and earn your rewards

how-to-implement: in your meta.json - define *extended* with url to this (json) file - https://raw.githubusercontent.com/cardanians/adapools.org/master/example-meta.json

info.url_png_icon_64x64: http(s) url to pool icon; not animated; max 40kb
info.url_png_logo: http(s) url to pool logo; not animated; max 50kb

company.name: Anchor Staking
company.addr: 8 The Green STE B, Dover, DE 19901

about.company: We offer Cardano, Kava, and WanChain multi-asset non-custodial staking, with server redundancy across multiple continents. We are always committed to 100% uptime for you.
